entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Rainfall amount 30 mm. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 10:22 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High 7. Forecast issued 10:22 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 10:22 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
